  • About Me

Le Peng

Email: peng0347 [at] umn [dot] edu

CV | Github | Google Scholar | LinkedIn

Hi there! I am a fourth-year Ph.D. student in Computer Science and Engineering at the University of Minnesota (UMN, twin-city), advised by Prof. Ju Sun. Previously, I received my B.Sc. in Computer Science and Engineering from Harbin Institute of Technology (HIT). I am interest in machine learning, deep learning, computer vision, natural language processing, and AI for healthcare.
